a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Fertility rate vs. average years of schooling, 2020

The
total fertility rate
, in a given year. Before 2015, the share without education are based on estimates; from
2015 onwards, they are based on projections.

Average years of schooling in 15-64 year olds
(years)

Total fertility rate
(live births per woman)
Data source: UN WPP (2024); HFD (2024); Barro and Lee (2015); Lee and Lee (2016)
